mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from board where bno>0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{pagePerNum}
mapper.update: update board set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where bno=#{bno};
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, regdate=now() where bno=#{bno}
